## DIDCommHttpTransport class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Implementation of [IDIDCommTransport](./did-comm.ididcommtransport.md) to provide a simple transport based on HTTP(S) requests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DIDCommHttpTransport extends AbstractDIDCommTransport
```

<b>Extends:</b> [AbstractDIDCommTransport](./did-comm.abstractdidcommtransport.md)

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                   | Modifiers | Description                                                                                    |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(httpMethod)](./did-comm.didcommhttptransport._constructor_.md) |           | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Creates a new [DIDCommHttpTransport](./did-comm.didcommhttptransport.md). |

## Properties

| Property                                                    | Modifiers | Type                | Description                                                                                                                      |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [httpMethod](./did-comm.didcommhttptransport.httpmethod.md) |           | 'post' &#124; 'get' | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Defines the default HTTP method to use if not specified in the DID Document service entry of the recipient. |

## Methods

| Method                                                                               | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                    |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [isServiceSupported(service)](./did-comm.didcommhttptransport.isservicesupported.md) |           | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns <code>true</code> if this transport is suitable for the provided DID Document service section, otherwise <code>false</code>.      |
| [send(service, message)](./did-comm.didcommhttptransport.send.md)                    |           | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Sends the provided raw message (without further processing) to the service endpoint defined in the provided DID Document service section. |
